attributes.action: Make it a Criminal Offence to Deface Our National Flags with any form of slogan or logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am British and proud of it and it disgusts me that an element of our society sees fit to to deface our National Flags--The Union Flag , St Georges Cross, the Saltire and the Flags of Wales and N.Ireland with various Slogans, Logo's etc.
I therefore call upon the Prime Minister to make it a Criminal Offence to Deface our National Flag(Union Flag) or the National Flags of Scotland ,Wales and N.Ireland with any Slogan ,Logo or any other wording. i.e names of football teams , countries etc.
